Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

After lurking this forum for at least a year, I've finally made an account and plan to get active in the community.

I'm experienced with both modded and vanilla gameplay, (modded is rarely better. Except MechJeb and Engineer. The two best mods ever) and have owned the game since... I cant remember what version. Crap. It's been 2 years at least though.

I've got ~1400 hours in-game, have landed on every orbital body except Jool (Obviously :p) and I've crashed everywhere except Bop! And I don't plan to go back, just in case.

I love career, sandbox is for flying planes. Science mode can kiss my Kerbol though.

Hopefully, I'll be plenty involved here! o7
Howdy. Glad you decided to stop lurking. :)

That was a good intro!

glad you're here
Welcome to the forum @ItBeNiro
